title: Front A Site Hold / Retake Haunt from A Pyramids
description: Here's a great Site Hold / Retake Haunt from A Pyramids for the front side A Site. This Haunt lands at an awkward angle for enemy players as they are pushing into the Site, increasing the chances of even briefly scanning enemy players, which trails them and opens them up to be picked off through their team's own Viper wall.

title: Early Round Elbow / Bottom Mid Haunt from Mid Nest
description: Here's a early round Haunt for Elbow and Bottom Mid, that should be used immediately after the spawn barrier goes down.

title: How to Split Sands With Haunt
description: This Haunt lineup scans all of Sands and a bit into Rafters, your teammates will have an easy time spamming through the door or simply fighting for control of it.

title: Default Dish Haunt From Barrier
description: Use this default Haunt lineup to scan any Defenders playing at Dish.

title: B Site Execute Haunt From Arcade
description: Enable your teammates pushing from Arcade or Tree with this Haunt, as it scans most of site and into Generator.

title: Attacker Default Haunt to Arcade From Barrier
description: Use this Haunt during your defaults to gather information on any Defender Arcade, and a bit into Tower.

title: Early Round B Arcade Haunt from B Bench
description: Here's a great early round Haunt from the B Bench spawn barrier for Arcade.

title: Early Round A Main Haunt to Push Back Oppers
description: Here's a great early round Haunt for A Main, that not only gives your team valuable information inside of A Main, but also makes it difficult for enemy oppers holding an angle on the Attacker Spawn entrance into A Main to continue to hold that angle.

title: Start Round Defender Dish Haunt
description: When playing at Dish, use this lineup to grab fast information. Attackers may hide from this Haunt, this is primarily used to set up a play.

title: Start Round Arcade Control Tether
description: Use this Seize lineup to combo utility for Arcade Control, or simply to contest for it.

title: Advanced B Site Hold Haunt
description: Here's a pretty straightforward Haunt lineup, that needs to be setup prior to enemy players pushing into B Site. Once the lineup lands, if it isn't broken it may reveal one or more enemy players behind smokes, opening up opportunities for you and your team to pick them off.

title: Simple B Site Retake Haunt from B Generator
description: Here's a simple, but effective way to look for picks on enemy players as they push into B Site.

title: Aggressive Early A Main Information Gathering
description: Here's a great way to gather early information in A Main, and potentially insert one of your teammates into A Main.

title: B Site Haunt + Haunt and Seize Combo Executes
description: While pushing into B Site, you can use either the first Haunt shown, or the Haunt + Seize combo shown after interchangeably, depending on what you think will provide the most value as you and your team push into B Site.

title: Early Round A Main Control Prowler
description: Use this early in the round to check for Defenders in A Main. This is useful during a Default to make it harder for enemy players to gather information on A Side of the map, and during more straightforward executes to make it easier for your team to scale up A Main.

title: Aggressive Early Round Mid Doors Prowler
description: Here's a simple, but effective way to not only gather information on whether or not players are playing in and around Mid Doors, but also apply pressure to that area of the map.

title: Mid Info / Support Utility
description: When playing from Art, it is often smart to throw a Haunt into Mid, to contest Defaults, and help your team to poke holes in the enemy team's map control. You can also use Prowlers at any stage of the round to check for players in Mid, and confirm information / reads that your team has.

title: B Link to Mid Info / Support Haunt Lineup
description: Use this Haunt to support your teammates as they fight for Mid Control, or to scan for enemy players when your team could benefit from gathering info in Mid.

title: B Site Retake / Site Hold Haunt Lineup from B Link
description: Here's a very effective B Site retake / site hold Haunt lineup from B Link, that can reveal players behind smokes and in key positions to set your teammates up for easy picks on Site.

title: Early Round A Restaurant Haunt from A Art
description: Here's a great early round Haunt from the A Art Spawn Barrier for A Restaurant.

title: Aggressive Early Round A Main Haunt
description: Here's a simple, but effective aggressive early round A Main Haunt + Prowler combo to make it more difficult for the Defenders to take space in A Main.

title: Early Round C Main Haunt
description: Here's a simple, but effective C Main Haunt from the C Lobby spawn barrier.

title: A Main Seize + Raze Paint Shells Combo
description: Use this early round A Main Seize + Paint Shells combo to get picks early in the round by catching enemy players who attempt to push through A Main quickly off guard, while also creating a window of opportunity that your team can use to gain an advantage when contesting A Main. You can also combo this with other utility that can work in combination with your Seize ability.

title: Quick C Link to C Main Haunt to Support C Hold / Retake
description: Use this Haunt when rotating to C to catch enemy players pushing through C Main off guard and support your team.

title: C Site Chokepoint Delay / Site Hold Haunt
description: Use this Chokepoint Delay / Site Hold Haunt to defend C Site from Attackers pushing through the C Main / C Site Chokepoint.

title: Early Round A Main Haunt
description: .Here's a simple, but effective early round A Main Haunt.

title: C Site Execute High Tide from C Long
description: Use this High Tide to Execute onto C Site from C Long.

title: High Tide + Cove A Site Full Execute
description: Use this High Tide + Cove Combo to execute onto A Site with your team, or fake an A push.

title: A Link to A Site Retake High Tide
description: A good High Tide to retake A Site with.

title: A Link to A Lobby Cascade
description: A good support Cascade to help your team push into A Main and take control.

title: B Site to Mid Window Cascade at Round Start
description: Use this Cascade to block vision from players in Mid Window close to the start of the round.

title: C Site Cove + Cascade Retake Spike Defuse
description: Here's a good way to safely bait out enemy positions, waste utility, and potentially half the spike when retaking C Site.

title: A Main to A Heaven Cove
description: A good use of your Cove ability to block A Heaven and get onto A Site.

title: A Rafters to A Main Cascade
description: A good Cascade to retake onto A Site with.

title: Mid Blue to B Oranges Cascade + Cove + High Tide Combo
description: A good combo of utility to use to take mid control and push toward B Site.

title: B Green to B Site High Tide
description: A good High Tide to block off common angles allowing your team to push onto B Site.

title: A Belt to A Pipes Cascade
description: A good Cascade to prevent the common Op angle and also allows you to push up A Belt.

title: B Site Execute High Tide from B Green
description: Here's a great B Site Execute High Tide for B Site from B Green.
